ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(!ISBLANK( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Walkin_SubSource__c))), ISCHANGED( Walkin_SubSource__c ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Strategy" , $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the walkin sub source.
